You can do most of the major ones in and around Kyoto in about a day, I 
would estimate. The Maekawa residence (Maekawa-tei), the Yagi residence 
(Yagi-tei), Aizu headquarters (Konkaikomyo-ji/Kurotani), Nijo Castle 
(Nijo-jo), Imperial Palace (Kyoto Gosho), Koudai Temple (Koudai-ji), "Ruins" 
of Fushimi Shinsengumi HQ (Fushimi-bugyosho ato).

There are other sites, but the easiest and cheapest thing to do (if you 
don't have the money to pay for train trips to Hiroshima and 
Aizu/Tokyo/Hakodate/Sendai, where the other major sites are) is to stick to 
Kyoto.

-M.
